titleStmt.title: The true souldiers convoy A sermon preached upon the xvjth. day of May 1640, vpon a prayer day, for the Princes good successe in going forth to warre. By William Bridge.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Lappagde and are to be sold at his house on the Iron Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his house on the Iron Bridge
